alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Indiana; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 6:48PM EDT until August 12 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Indiana County in west central Pennsylvania... Northern Westmoreland County in southwestern Pennsylvania... Southern Armstrong County in west central Pennsylvania... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 648 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Apollo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Indiana, Vandergrift, Homer City, Apollo, Murrysville, Lower Burrell, Blairsville, Leechburg, Black Lick, Clymer, North Apollo, West Leechburg, Avonmore, Orchard Hills, Saltsburg, Oklahoma, West Lebanon, New Florence, East Vandergrift, and New Alexandria. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southwestern and west central Pennsylvania. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
